name: THE GOAT OF THE WOOD'S
description:
William Cooper is an old stager Journalist for a company ,He took the vacation after working many years He traveled to Arizona for put your feet up at The Goat of the Woods HotelWhen he arrived it was twilight after reach out the reserved room He was extremely tired. from several hours of traveling Exhausted, he lay down on the bed. But can’t sleep very well, he could hear every noisy going on Whether it be a sound came from the front door. Knocking sounds around the room It's really weird one of the sounds coming from balcony Impossible! for someone to knock on the balcony. but with anxiety could think was the sound of the strong wind hitting sash window. The worse is when he heard noisy like Nails scratching the walls around the room but he seem didn't care and fell asleep. about 3am he woke up, hungry and wanting to go to the bathroom with drowsy when he walked out, found the Pentagram symbol that appeared on the wall in his room. So he called Room Service asking for check the CCTV in front of the room whether someone came in or not. But after calling, no one picks up the phone. He walked out of the room and headed towards the lobby But the ambience around the hotel has changed. It looked desolate and lonesomeness. When he arrived in front of the lobby no one here.William walked back to his room. Then, next to the Pentagram, an indecipherable sentence appeared. He began to feel that this hotel was strange. So he hurriedly packed up and went to the exit of the hotel. When he walked to find that the exit door was gone,He tried to find a way out of here.

  • A / D : Movement
  • E and Left click : Interact
